game.name: LEGO® Voyagers
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: LEGO® Builder's Journey 제작진이 선보이는 우정과 놀이에 관한 새로운 2인 협동 어드벤처. 버려진 우주선을 구하는 것을 임무로 삼은 두 친구는 꿈에 그리던 그 이상의 여정을 시작합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: From the makers of LEGO® Builder's Journey comes a new 2-player co-op adventure about friendship and play. When two friends make it their mission to rescue an abandoned spaceship, they embark on a journey beyond their wildest dreams.

reviewHighlights.text: Fantastic. My partner and I played this over a day, and it was so much fun and surprisingly for a *lego game*, profoundly moving. I cried. I can't eve...
This might be the single most emotionally profound game I have ever played. I was completely shocked by how many different feelings Lego Voyagers was...
